alert.note: Alert for Scott (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 11:44PM EST until February 18 at 5:41PM EST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia...Tennessee... Clinch River At Cleveland VA affecting Wise, Russell and Scott Counties. Clinch River Near Speers Ferry VA affecting Hancock and Scott Counties. Clinch River Above Tazewell TN affecting Hancock, Grainger and Claiborne Counties. North Fork Holston River Near Gate City VA affecting Hawkins, Sullivan and Scott Counties. Pigeon River At Newport TN affecting Cocke County. Powell River Near Arthur TN affecting Claiborne and Union Counties. Powell River Near Jonesville VA affecting Hancock and Lee Counties. Sequatchie River Near Whitwell TN affecting Bledsoe, Sequatchie and Marion Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Fork Holston River near Gate City VA. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Caution stage. At 12.0 feet, Water begins to cover some low lying county roads. At 14.0 feet, County Road 614 is cut off 1 1/2 miles downstream from the Highway 23 bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 13.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 400 AM EST /300 AM CST/.
